sections.title: Pit Fighter (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Pit Fighter class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: Pit fighters are proficient with simple and martial weapons that have the performance quality, plus light and medium armor and shields (excluding tower shields).

sections.title: Poor Equipment ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: As a swift action, the pit fighter can ignore the broken condition on one weapon or armor piece for the remainder of the encounter, though only one item can be affected at a time.

sections.title: Showmanship ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: The pit fighter can treat regular combat as performance combat a limited number of times per day, making performance checks against DCs based on encounter CR.

sections.title: Arena Weapon Expertise ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: When using performance quality weapons, the pit fighter gains scaling bonuses to damage rolls and critical hit confirmation rolls.

sections.title: Weapon Trick ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: Grants Improved Dirty Trick as a bonus feat and allows using performance weapons for dirty trick maneuvers that also deal normal melee damage once per round.

sections.title: Roar of the Crowd ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: During performance combat, the pit fighter can rage when the crowd's attitude is helpful, but becomes fatigued if the crowd turns unfriendly or hostile.

sections.title: Tricky Assault ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: Grants Quick Dirty Trick as a bonus feat, allowing dirty trick combat maneuvers to replace melee attacks using the highest base attack bonus.

sections.title: Brutal Trick ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: Grants Greater Dirty Trick as a bonus feat and causes creatures removing dirty trick conditions to provoke attacks of opportunity from the pit fighter.

sections.title: Greater Roar of the Crowd ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Pit Fighter)
sections.description: Allows rage at friendly or better crowd attitudes, provides enhanced bonuses when crowd is helpful, and reduces fatigue penalties to only occur when crowd becomes hostile.
